RuleDefinition: cooler(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', 't')), spaceTempAbove25(t), -->, coolerHasStatusON(x)
cooler(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', 't')), spaceTempBelow25(t), -->, coolerHasStatusOFF(x)
heater(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', 't')), spaceTempAbove24(t), -->, heaterHasStatusOFF(x)
heater(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', 't')), spaceTempBelow15(t), -->, heaterHasStatusON(x)
heater(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', '27')), heaterHasStatusON(x), -->, alert(x)
Light(x), Room(y), isInRoom(('x', 'y')), NotOccupied(y), lightHasStatusON(x), -->, alert(x)
heater(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceTemp(('y', '13')), heaterHasStatusOFF(x), -->, alert(x)
Appliance(x), Space(y), isInSpace(('x', 'y')), spaceNotOccupied(y), applianceHasStatusON(x), -->, alert(x)
smokeDetector(x), zone(z), isInZone(('x', 'z')), DetectorHasStatusON(x), -->, alarm(y), isInZone(y, z), alarmHasStatusON(y)
person(x), smartDevice(y), -->, authValue(z), apply(x, y, z)
